Detailed Description

A tagged heap block represents a block of memory allocated by a tagged heap category.

When the allocate(sz size, sz align) method called, it will increase the memory usage and then return the pointer data_p_ + usage_. All memory allocation inside tagged heap block cannot be deallocated individually. The only way to deallocate it is deallocating all of the blocks in a tagged heap category.
